analyzed: a raṇantau uddiṭṭhā ati

original: vissajjanaṃ na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā. Ye pana asaṅgāhakā eva na honti dukkhasaccādidhammā,
analyzed: vissajjanam na ruhanti iti na uddhaṭāḥ ye pana a saṅgāhakāḥ eva na honti dukkha sacca ādi dhammā

original: tesu vattabbameva natthi. Yathā pana vedanākkhandhādayo na ruhanti, taṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: tesu vattabbam eva natthi yathā pana vedanā kkhandha ādayaḥ na ruhanti tam dassetuṃ

original: asampayogehi vomissatāya sampayogo natthīti attho.
analyzed: a sampayogehi vomissa tāya sampayogaḥ natthi iti attho

original: na tesaṃ vippayogo natthīti “vippayogo ca natthī”ti na vuttaṃ, na vedanākkhandhena

1. Mātikāvaṇṇanā

original: hotīti āha “vārasamatāyā”ti. Bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatīti ettha parinibbānacittameva

analyzed: bhavaṅga utaraṇa bhāvena vuttan ti daṭṭhabbam

original: 17. Mahāpayogoti mahākiriyo vipattikaraṇamahāmeghuṭṭhānākāravināso. Tiṭṭheyyāti vināso nappavatteyyāti attho.
analyzed: mahā payogo ti mahā kiriyaḥ vipatti karaṇa mahā meghu ṭṭhāna ākāra vināso tiṭṭheyya ati vināsaḥ na pavatteyya ati attho

original: 18. Araṇīyattāti payirupāsitabbattā.
analyzed: araṇīya ttā ati payirupāsitabba ttā

original: 20. Yāya katakiccatā hoti, tāya aggavijjāya adhigatāya tevijjatābhāvo nippariyāyatā, sā ca āgamanavasena siddhā sātisayā tevijjatāti āha “āgamanīyameva dhura”nti.
analyzed: yāya kata kicca tā hoti tāya agga vijjāya adhigatāya tevijja tā bhāvaḥ nippariyāya tā sā ca āgamana vasena siddhā sa atisayā tevijja tā iti āha āgamanīyam eva dhuranti

original: 22. Tattha cāti nimittatthe bhummaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇappattiyā ādhārabhāve vā. Tattheva hi sabbaññutaṃ patto nāma hotīti.
analyzed: tattha ca ati nimitta atthe bhummam sabbaññuta ññāṇa ppattiyāḥ ādhāra bhāve vā tattha iva hi sabbaññutam pattaḥ nāma hoti iti

original: 23. Ananussutesu dhammesūti ca ananussutesu saccesūti attho.
analyzed: an anussutesu dhammesu iti ca an anussutesu saccesu iti attho

original: 24. “Rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādike nirodhasamāpattiante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā “yato
analyzed: rūpī rūpāni passati iti ādike nirodha samāpatti ante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā yatas

original: kho, ānanda, bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā
analyzed: kho ānanda bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya ca ssa disvā

analyzed: āsavā parikkhīṇāḥ honti ayam vuccati ānanda bhikkhu ubhatobhāga vimuttaḥ ti yadi pi

analyzed: viharati iti āha kīṭāgirisutte hi idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā

original: Kāyasakkhimhipi eseva nayo.
analyzed: kāya sakkhimhi pi esa iva nayo

analyzed: anantaraḥ kālo ti adhippāyaḥ accanta saṃyoge ca ittha upayoga vacanam daṭṭhabbam phuṭṭha anantara kālam eva

original: thiraṃ karotīti veditabbaṃ. Saddahanto vimuttoti etena sabbathā avimuttassapi saddhāmattena

original: 29. Paññaṃ vāhetīti paññaṃ sātisayaṃ pavattetīti attho. Paññā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti nibbānābhimukhaṃ gametīti attho.

original: catusaccapaccavekkhaṇādīnaṃ upanissayabhāvaṃ dasseti. Sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ nissayo

analyzed: etassa ati hi sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ ti dutiyena atthena sambodhi param ayanam etassa ati sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ

original: 32. Kevalena kulasaddena mahākulameva vuccatīti āha “mahābhogakulesuyeva nibbattatīti attho”ti.
analyzed: kevalena kula saddena mahā kulam eva vuccati iti āha nibbattati iti atthaḥ ti

original: 33. Khandhabījaṃ nāma paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ. Ihaṭṭhakanijjhānikavaseneva imasmiṃ ṭhāne

analyzed: idha na hoti heṭṭhā upari ca saṃsaraṇako kāma bhava gataḥ hīna jhānako idha

original: gaṇanūpagoti adhippāyo.
analyzed: adhippāyo

original: 34. Yaṃ vattabbanti “dvīhi kāraṇehi tanubhāvo veditabbo”tiādi yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti attho.
analyzed: yam vattabbam ti dvīhi kāraṇehi tanu bhāvaḥ veditabba utiādi yam vattabbam siyā ati atthaḥ

original: 36. Upapannaṃ vā samanantarāti upapannaṃ vā etena puggalena hoti, atha samanantarā
analyzed: upapannam vā samanantarā ati upapannam vā etena puggalena hoti atha samanantarā

original: ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti. Appattaṃ vā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇanti āyuppamāṇaṃ tassa puggalassa

analyzed: vemajjham appattam hoti etthantare ariya maggam sañjaneti iti ayam ettha pāḷi atthaḥ

analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyam pana a patvā pabbatam nadī iti viya āyu ppamāṇam vemajjham appattam

analyzed: vā hutvā iti para sadda yoge paratas bhūtaḥ hutvā saddo vacana sesa bhūto payutto ti veditabbo

original: 37. Upahaccāti etassa upagantvāti attho, tena vemajjhātikkamo kālakiriyopagamanañca saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “atikkamitvā vemajjha”ntiādi.

original: 40. Uddhaṃvāhibhāvenāti uddhaṃ vahatīti uddhaṃvāhī, taṇhāsotaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ vā, tassa
analyzed: uddhaṃvāhi bhāvena ati uddham vahati iti uddhaṃvāhī taṇhā sotam vaṭṭa sotam vā tassa

analyzed: bhāvaḥ tena uddhaṃvāhi bhāvena ati vuttam hoti avihesu yadi api tattha parinibbāyī

original: na hoti, yattha vā tattha vā gantvā parinibbāyatu, parinibbāyino pana tassa asaṅkhāraparinibbāyitā
analyzed: na hoti yattha vā tattha vā gantvā parinibbāyatu parinibbāyinaḥ pana tassa asaṅkhāra parinibbāyi tā

original: sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyitā ca atthīti tattha dasa anāgāmino vuttā, evaṃ atappādīsupi.

original: Anupahaccatalāti appattatalā. Asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnaṃ lahusālahusagatikā
analyzed: anupahaccatalā ati appatta talā asaṅkhāra sa saṅkhāra parinibbāyīnam lahusa alahusa gatikā

original: eva parittavipulatiṇakaṭṭhajhāpakapappaṭikāsadisatā veditabbā, na uppajjitvāva nibbāyanakādīhi

original: uddhaṃsotato ca adhimattānadhimattatā. Te eva hi asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyinoti.

original: Tato mahantatareti vacanaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhajhāpanasamatthapappaṭikādassanatthaṃ, na adhimatta

original: 108. Ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabboti ucchaṅgasadisapaññatāya eva

analyzed: cira ṭṭhānataḥ thira ṭṭhānataḥ ca pāsāṇa lekha sadisā para aparādha nibbattā kodha lekhā yassa saḥ pāsāṇa lekhu upama samannāgataḥ pāsāṇa lekhu upamaḥ ti vuttaḥ evam itare pi

original: 118. Sutādivatthurahito tucchamāno naḷo viyāti “naḷo”ti vuccati, so uggato naḷo etassāti unnaḷo.

original: 122. “Sīlakathā ca no bhavissatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ sīlakathābhavanaṃ paṭhamārambhopi dussīlena saha na hotīti dassento āha neva sīlakathā hotī”ti.

133. Parena kataṃ dussīlyaṃ āṇattiyā attanā ca payogena katanti āṇattiyā pāpassa dāyādo “tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādo”ti vutto.

analyzed: desanāya dhammānam ñāṇassa āpātha bhāva sampādanam ñāṇa ugghāṭanam saha udāhaṭa velāya ati udāhaṭa velāya saddhim tasmin kāle an atikkante eva ati attho

original: 152. Tanti anantaravacanaṃ vadati. “Katamo loko”ti vutte “pañcupādānakkhandhā”ti mahantaṃ atthaṃ saṅgahitvā ṭhitavacanaṃ atthayuttaṃ. Lujjatīti lokoti kāraṇayuttaṃ.

original: 156. Sahitāsahitassāti sahitāsahiteti attho, sahitāsahitassa paricchindaneti vā.

analyzed: mahāvaggo

original: 2. Paccanīkānulomavaṇṇanā

analyzed: cakkhu indriya ādīhi niyamita ttā jīvitindriya ādīnam pavatti vasena api labbhamānānam upapatti cuti vasena iva

original: 190. Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ cakkhundriyādisamānagatikaṃ cutipaṭisandhivaseneva gacchati

analyzed: santa anuppatti nirodha dassanato ti āha pavatte somanassa vippayutta cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe ti

analyzed: arūpa jīvitindriyam sandhāya vuttanti etesam ca iva aññesam ca yathā lābha vasena ati

original: ettha etesaṃ jīvitindriyādīnaṃ cutipaṭisandhipavattesu, aññesañca cakkhundriyādīnaṃ

original: chedoti nāmaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: chedaḥ ti nāmam daṭṭhabbam

original: Yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjati, tassa jīvitindriyaṃ na uppajjatīti?

analyzed: vinā somanassena upapajjantānam pavatte somanassa vippayutta cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe

original: puggaladīpakamevāti.
analyzed: puggala dīpakam eva ati

analyzed: pavatti vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 3. Pariññāvāravaṇṇanā
435-482. Pariññāvāre lokiyaabyākatamissakāni cāti dukkhasaccapariyāpannehi ekantapariññeyyehi
analyzed: pariññā vāre lokiya abyākata missakāni ca ati dukkha sacca pariyāpannehi ekanta pariññeyyehi

original: pariññeyyatā ca vuttā. Yadi pariññeyyamissakattā pariññeyyatā hoti, kasmā dhammayamake
analyzed: pariñeyya tā ca vuttā yadi pariññeyya missaka ttā pariññeyya tā hoti kasmā dhamma yamake

analyzed: te ca vedanā khandha ādi bhāvam gahetvā parijānitabbāḥ na abyākata bhāvanti

original: Kasmā panettha dukkhasaccabhājanīye āgatassa domanassassa pahātabbatāva vuttā, na

original: aggahitā kusalākusalāpi pariññeyyāti? Saccaṃ, yathā pana vedanākkhandhādibhāvo bhāvetabbapahātabbabhāvehi

original: Ākāroti mūlādiākāro. Atthoti tenākārena upakārakatā. “Yenākārenā”ti etassa vā atthavacanaṃ

analyzed: vippayuttam a paṭhitvā cha hākārehi iti purima pāṭhaḥ tam pana paṭhitvā satta hākārehi iti

original: paṭhanti. Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo hettha vuccati, na ca yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ nissayo hoti, taṃ
analyzed: paṭhanti ukkaṭṭha paricchedaḥ ha ittha vuccati na ca yam ārammaṇam nissayaḥ hoti tam

original: hoti, na taṃ kammapaccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Pakatūpanissayo pakatūpanissayovā”ti vuttaṃ,

original: Indriyaṃ pana alabhantaṃ atthi, kintaṃ? Jīvitindriyanti. Yadi evaṃ upādārūpāni sandhāya

original: 644. Yathā ca heṭṭhāti yathā nahetumūlake yāva navipākā, tāva gantvā nāhārindriyesu ekekameva gahitaṃ, tathā idhāpi nārammaṇamūlakādīsu ekekameva gahitanti adhippāyo.

original: 648. Nānākkhaṇikā kusalākusalacetanā kammasamuṭṭhānarūpassāti ettha “vipākāna”ntipi

original: 2. Vedanāttikavaṇṇanā
1. Vedanārūpanibbānāni pana tikamuttakāni paṭiccādiniyamaṃ paccayuppannavacanañca
analyzed: vedanā rūpa nibbānāni pana tika muttakāni paṭicca ādi niyamam paccaya uppanna vacanam ca

original: na labhanti. Paṭiccavārādīsu pana chasu yato hetupaccayādito tikadhammānaṃ uppatti
analyzed: na labhanti paṭiccavāra ādīsu pana chasu yatas hetu paccaya āditaḥ tika dhammānam uppatti

original: vuttā, tattha yathānurūpato ārammaṇādipaccayabhāvena labbhantīti veditabbānīti.
analyzed: vuttā tattha yathā anurūpataḥ ārammaṇa ādi paccaya bhāvena labbhanti iti veditabbāni iti

original: 10. Sabbaarūpadhammapariggāhakā pana sahajātādayo paccayāti iminā kusalattikepi parihīnaṃ

original: dassitā hoti. Pacchājātapaccayañca vināva uppattitoti etena pana pacchājātapaccayassa

analyzed: hoti kasmā pana sahajāta nibandhanā ca ye te iva parihāyanti

analyzed: ca vinā iti atthaḥ atha vā sahajāta nibandhanānam eva na pacchājātassa sahajāta anibandhanassa ati

original: ettheva kāraṇaṃ vadanto “sahajātādīhi vinā anuppattito pacchājātapaccayañca vināva
analyzed: ettha iva kāraṇam vadanto sahajāta ādīhi vinā anuppattitaḥ pacchājāta paccayam ca

original: uppattito”ti āha. Sahajātanibandhanāpi pana sabbaarūpadhammapariggāhakāyeva parihāyantīti dassitametanti.
analyzed: uppattitaḥ ti āha sahajāta nibandhanā api pana sabba arūpa dhamma pariggāhakāya iva parihāyanti iti dassitam etat ti

original: 17. Navipākepi eseva nayoti nayadassanameva karoti, na ca paccayapaccayuppannasāmaññadassanaṃ.

original: Mohassa cāpi hi ahetukassa adhipatiabhāvato adhipatino nahetumūlake anulomato aṭṭhānanti.

original: 39. Pañhāvāre domanassaṃ uppajjatīti etena taṃsampayutte dasseti. Upanissayavibhaṅge

original: 63-64. Sādhipatiamohavasenāti adhipatibhāvasahitāmohavasenāti attho.

analyzed: ca a vitakka vicāra mattam kammam appamāṇam mahaggatam ca tat ca dubbalam na hoti iti

original: vacanehi viññāyatīti.
analyzed: vacanehi viññāyati iti

original: Vitakkattikavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vitakkattika vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 8. Dassanenapahātabbattikavaṇṇanā
analyzed: dassanena apahātabba ttika vaṇṇanā

original: Dassanenapahātabbattike dassanena pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ekenapi paccayena paccayo na hotīti idaṃ paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge vicāritanayena vicāretabbanti.
analyzed: dassanena pahātabba ttike dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ekena api paccayena paccayaḥ na hoti iti idam paṭiccasamuppāda vibhaṅge vicārita nayena vicāretabbanti

original: Dassanenapahātabbattikavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dassanena apahātabba ttika vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Pucchāgaṇanagāthāyo
analyzed: pucchā gaṇana gāthāyo

original: Kusalādi ekakattaya-mathādi antena majjhimantena;
analyzed: kusala ādi eka kattaya matha ādi antena majjhimantena

original: Ādi ca majjhena dukā, tayo tikeko ca viññeyyo.
analyzed: ādi ca majjhena dukā tayo ca viññeyyo

original: Tesvekekaṃ mūlaṃ katvā, taṃ sattasattakā pucchā;
analyzed: tesu ekekam mūlam katvā tam satta sattakā pucchā

original: Ekekapaccaye yathā, bhavanti ekūnapaññāsa.
analyzed: eka eka paccaye yathā bhavanti ekūnapaññāsa

original: Chasattatādhikasataṃ, sahassamekañca suddhike pucchā;
analyzed: cha sattata adhika satam sahassam ekam ca suddhike pucchā

original: Esa ca nayonulome, paccanīye cāti nāññattha.
analyzed: ca naya unulome paccanīye ca ati

original: Rāsiguṇitassa rāsissaḍḍhaṃ, saha rāsikassa piṇḍo so;
analyzed: rāsi guṇitassa rāsiḥ saḍḍham saha rāsikassa piṇḍaḥ saḥ

original: Rāsissa vā sahekassaḍḍhaṃ, puna rāsinā guṇitaṃ.
analyzed: rāsissa vā saha ikassaḍḍham punar rāsinā guṇitam

original: Iti hetumūlakāduka-tikādayo chacca sattatisatā dve;
analyzed: iti chat ca sattati satāḥ dve

original: Catuvīsatettha pucchā, aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassanahutañca.
analyzed: catuvīsatā ittha pucchāḥ

original: Tāsaṃ yasmā suddhika-nayo na paccekapaccaye tasmā;
analyzed: tāsam yasmā suddhi kanayaḥ na paccekapaccaye tasmā

original: Catuvīsatiguṇitānaṃ, sasuddhikānaṃ ayaṃ gaṇanā.
analyzed: catuvīsati guṇitānam sa suddhikānam gaṇanā

original: Lakkhattayaṃ dvinahutaṃ, pañca sahassāni satta ca satāni;
analyzed: lakkhattayam dvi nahutam pañca sahassāni satta ca satāni

original: Dvāpaññāsā etā, anulome piṇḍitā pucchā.
analyzed: dvāpaññāsā etāḥ anulome piṇḍitā pucchā

original: Anulomasadisagaṇanā, bhavanti pucchānaye ca paccanīye;
analyzed: anuloma sadisa gaṇanāḥ bhavanti puccha anaye ca paccanīye

original: Hāpetvā pana sese, nayadvaye suddhike laddhā.
analyzed: hāpetvā pana sese naya dvaye suddhike laddhā

original: Chappaññāsa bhavanti pucchā, chasatasahitañca lakkhaterasakaṃ;
analyzed: chappaññāsa bhavanti pucchā cha sata sahitañca lakkha terasakam

original: Pucchānayesu gaṇitā, paṭiccavāre catūsvapi.
analyzed: pucchā nayesu gaṇitā paṭiccavāre catūsu api

original: Sattahi guṇitā kusalattike dvayaṃ, navutiñceva pañcasatā;
analyzed: guṇitā kusala ttike dvayam pañcasatā

original: Cattāri sahassāni ca, tathekanavute ca lakkhakā.
analyzed: cattāri sahassāni ca ca lakkhakā

original: Nādvāvīsati guṇitā, tikesu sabbesu vīsati ca koṭi;
analyzed: guṇitā tikesu sabbesu vīsati ca

original: Lakkhattayaṃ sahassaṃ, catuvīsati cāpi viññeyyā.
analyzed: lakkhattayam sahassam catuvīsati ca api viññeyyā

original: Tikapaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: tika paṭṭhānam

original: Ekakapaccaye pana, nava nava katvā sasoḷasadvisataṃ;
analyzed: ekaka paccaye pana nava nava katvā sa soḷasa dvi satam

original: Hetudukapaṭhamavāre, paṭhamanaye suddhike pucchā.
analyzed: hetu duka paṭhama vāre paṭhama naye suddhike pucchā

original: Hetādimūlakanaye-svekekasmiṃ dukādibhedayute;
analyzed: heta ādi mūlaka nayesu eka ekasmin duka ādi bheda yute

original: Caturāsīticatusata-sahitaṃ sahassadvayaṃ pucchā.
analyzed: catur asīti catu sata sahitam sahassa dvayam pucchā

original: Tā catuvīsatiguṇitā, sasuddhikā ettha honti anulome;
analyzed: tā catuvīsati guṇitā sa suddhikāḥ ettha honti anulome

original: Dvattiṃsaṭṭhasatādhika-sahassanavakaḍḍhalakkhakā.
analyzed: dvattiṃsa ṭṭha sata adhika sahassa navaka ḍḍhalakkhakā

original: Evaṃ paccanīye dve, suddhikarahitā catūsvato honti;
analyzed: evam paccanīye dve suddhika rahitā honti

original: Channavutaṭṭhasataṭṭha-tiṃsasahassadvilakkhakāni.
analyzed: chat navuta ṭṭha sata ṭṭha tiṃsa sahassa dvi lakkhakāni

original: Tā pana sattaguṇā dve, sattatisatadvayaṃ sahassāni;
analyzed: tā pana sattaguṇā dve sattati sata dvayam sahassāni

original: Dvāsattati honti tato, soḷasa lakkhāni hetuduke.
analyzed: dvāsattati honti tato soḷasa lakkhāni hetuduke

original: Tā sataguṇā dukasate, satadvayaṃ sattavīsati sahassā;
analyzed: tā sataguṇā sata dvayam sattavīsati sahassā

original: Dvāsattatilakkhāni ca, soḷasakoṭi tato pucchā.
analyzed: ca tatas pucchā

original: Dukapaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: duka paṭṭhānam

original: Dukatikapaṭṭhāne tika-pakkhepo hoti ekamekaduke;
analyzed: duka tika paṭṭhāne tika pakkhepaḥ hoti ekam eka duke

original: Tassa chasaṭṭhiguṇena te, chasaṭṭhisataṃ dukā honti.
analyzed: tassa chasaṭṭhi guṇena te chasaṭṭhi satam dukāḥ honti

original: Hetudukaladdhapucchā, guṇitā tehi ca honti tikapadameva;
analyzed: hetu duka laddha pucchā guṇitā tehi ca honti tika padam eva

original: Dukapaṭṭhāne pucchā, tāsaṃ gaṇanā ayaṃ ñeyyā.
analyzed: duka paṭṭhāne pucchā tāsam gaṇanā ayam ñeyyā

original: Dvāpaññāsa satāni ca, naveva nahutāni nava ca saṭṭhiñca;
analyzed: dvāpaññāsa satāni ca nava iva nahutāni nava ca saṭṭhiñca

original: Lakkhāni tīhi sahitaṃ, sataṃ sahassañca koṭinaṃ.
analyzed: lakkhāni tīhi sahitam satam sahassam ca

original: Dukatikapaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: dukatika paṭṭhānam

original: Tikadukapaṭṭhāne tika-mekekaṃ dvisatabhedanaṃ katvā;
analyzed: tika duka paṭṭhāne tikam ekekam dvi sata bhedanam katvā

original: Dvāvīsadvisataguṇā, ñeyyā kusalattike laddhā.
analyzed: dvāvīsa dvi sata guṇā ñeyyā kusala ttike laddhā

original: Pucchā aṭṭhasatādhika-catusahassadvilakkhayuttānaṃ;
analyzed: pucchā aṭṭha sata adhika catu sahassa dvi lakkha yuttānam

original: Koṭīnaṃ chakkamatho, koṭisahassāni cattāri.
analyzed: koṭīnam chakkam atho koṭi sahassāni cattāri

original: Tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: tika duka paṭṭhānam

original: Tikatikapaṭṭhāne, tesaṭṭhividhekekabhedanā tu tikā;
analyzed: tika tika paṭṭhāne tu tikā

original: Tehi ca guṇitā kusala-ttikapucchāpi honti pucchā tā.
analyzed: tehi ca guṇitā kusalattika pucchā api honti pucchā tā

original: Dvādasa pañcasatā catu-saṭṭhisahassāni navuti cekūnā;
analyzed: dvādasa pañca satā catusaṭṭhi sahassāni navuti

original: Lakkhānamekasaṭṭhi, dvādasasatakoṭiyo ceva.
analyzed: dvādasa sata koṭiyaḥ ca iva

original: Tikatikapaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: tika tika paṭṭhānam

original: Dvayahīnadvayasataguṇo, ekeko dukaduke tehi;
analyzed: dvaya hīna dvaya sata guṇaḥ ekekaḥ duka duke tehi

original: Hetuduke laddhā saṅkhya-bhedehi ca vaḍḍhitā pucchā.
analyzed: hetu duke laddhā saṅkhya bhedehi ca vaḍḍhitā pucchā

original: Chasatayutāni pañcā-sītisahassāni lakkhanavakañca;
analyzed: cha sata yutāni pañca asīti sahassāni lakkha navakañca

original: Ekādasāpi koṭi, puna koṭisatāni tettiṃsa.
analyzed: puna koṭi satāni

original: Dukadukapaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: duka duka paṭṭhānam

original: Sampiṇḍitā tu pucchā, anulome chabbidhepi paṭṭhāne;
analyzed: sampiṇḍitā tu pucchā anulome chabbidhe api paṭṭhāne

original: Chattiṃsatisatasahassa-ṭṭhakayutasattanahutāni.
analyzed: chattiṃsati sata sahassa ṭṭhaka yuta sattana hutāni

original: Lakkhāni chacca cattā-līseva navātha koṭiyo dasa ca;
analyzed: lakkhāni chacca cattālīsā iva nava atha koṭiyaḥ dasa ca

original: Sattakoṭisatehi ca, koṭisahassāni nava honti.
analyzed: satta koṭi satehi ca koṭi sahassāni nava honti

original: Tā catuguṇitā pucchā, catuppabhede samantapaṭṭhāne;
analyzed: tā catu guṇitā pucchā catu pabhede samanta paṭṭhāne

original: Catucattālīsasatattayaṃ, sahassāni terasa ca.
analyzed: sahassāni terasa ca

original: Sattāsīti ca lakkhānaṃ, koṭīnañca sattasattatiyo;
analyzed: ca lakkhānam koṭīnam ca satta sattatiyaḥ

original: Hontiṭṭhasatāniṭṭha-tiṃsasatasahassāni iti gaṇanā.
analyzed: iti gaṇanā

original: Paṭṭhānassa pucchāgaṇanagāthā.
analyzed: paṭṭhānassa pucchā gaṇana gāthā

original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa-mūlaṭīkā samattā.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa mūla ṭīkā samattā

original: Iti bhadantaānandācariyakena katā līnatthapadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: iti bhadanta ānanda ācariyakena katā līna attha pada vaṇṇanā

original: Abhidhammassa mūlaṭīkā samattā.
analyzed: abhidhammassa mūla ṭīkā samattā
